review_text: We recently bought ChildLife Essentials Sleep Essential for our child. It's a melatonin-free, all-natural sleep aid that uses herbal ingredients to promote relaxation and calmness before bed. Our child likes the taste of the convenient liquid form, and it's easy to measure out the dosage. We've noticed a positive improvement in their bedtime routine, with them being calmer in the evenings and falling asleep easier. It's also nice to know the ingredients are all-natural and safe for children. Overall, we're happy with ChildLife Essentials Sleep Essential. It's a gentle and effective way to help our child get a better night's sleep.
